conbody.p: Created by William Abernathy on Sep 20, 2023
Salesforce's Stabilize the Hostname for My Domain URLs in Sandboxes critical update must be activated. This critical update is turned on automatically after 7/18/2020.

ol.li: In Setup, enter Connected Apps in the Quick Find.
In the Permitted Users dropdown, select Admin approved users are pre-authorized.
Click OK to accept the security warning. You will satisfy the requirements in the following steps.
Scroll down and select Manage Profiles or Manage Permission Sets (depending on how you want to manage access to Conga Orchestrate).
Choose the profiles or permission sets that will have access to Conga Orchestrate.

conbody.p: With the Orchestrate Connected App configured, follow the steps below to ensure the remote site settings are properly configured.

ol.li: In Salesforce Setup, enter Remote Sites in the Quick Find.
Select the Orchestrate Setup Service Remote Site.Note: You may have to click Next Page to access this remote site.
Ensure that the Active checkbox is checked.
